post.body: "You can only push a girl away for so long until she walks out of ur life on her own ~R U sure its wat u want? she isn't coming back "
Terrible migraine. What makes someone be cruel to someone they do not know? They always seem to come out on top~and noone ever asks why..
when I want sincerity tell me where else can I turn. ur the one I depend upon.

"I was forgiven, but she would never forget the way she felt that night~reminiscent of an old Grant~Kerr movie...save ur invitation" (K.B)

hard day~What I got to do to be heard? What do I do when lightning strikes me? What have I got to do? When sorry seems 2 b the hardest word.

In meetings this morning. Will be at the school most of the day into the evening. I really need to be cloned today. : /
"To lose a treasured heart once is unfortunate. Twice is neglect. . there will not be a third chance so take care to hold it close." L.S.
you hear it, you know it. Yet to see it breaks my heart.
you found creative ways to distance you hid away from much through humor your choice of armor was your intellect~yet still I loved u (a.m.)
I must have been asleep for days And moving lips to breathe ur name I opened up my eyes I found myself alone alone Alone above a raging sea
" Quanto patetico essere nell'amore con la persona chi non ama il thee? "

Coin operated boy With his pretty coin operated voice Saying that he loves me that hes thinking of me Straight and to the point
"The 1 u have no time 4 may b the 1 u will miss the most. Make time for those u luv~1nce they become apathetic~they go & dnt look back." ST
